::The Lavacons::

Astral shruggs. "Well, Zardus said we could slag the Maximals if they 
fire on us this time."

He watches Wheeljack take off, and opens a comm to Zardus. "Zardus, me 
and the Lavacons are on our way as well. I'm not sure where Fenox is, 
but the rest of us are coming."

"Hmm.. No, remain at base with your team." Zardus's voice replies. "I 
don' want to leave it undefended."

Astral sighs, turning to his team. "Well, we might as well test out 
this complex while we're in it."

The Lavacons enter the new repair station, seeing if things worked or 
not.
